SEARCH
Package main

Class Action

java.lang.Object
main.Action
All Implemented Interfaces:
InterfaceAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
Adder, CountWords, Factorial, Multiplier, WordCount
public abstract class Action extends Object implements InterfaceAction
The abstract base class representing an action to be performed by an invoker. Any concrete class extending Action must implement the operation method.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected int[]
    values
    Array of values representing the input type for the action.
